subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Silvan Zurbriggen of Switzerland won the downhill on the Saslong course in Val Gardena, Italy, his first podium finish in the downhill, to take the lead in the overall World Cup standings.
snippet: Silvan Zurbriggen of Switzerland won the downhill on the Saslong course in Val Gardena, Italy, his first podium finish in the downhill, to take the lead in the overall World Cup standings.
